source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_SEQ_00<tab>Tataru has grown rather accustomed to her life in Kugane.
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_SEQ_00<tab>ウルダハ商館のタタルは、出番に張り切っているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TODO_00<tab>Search Kugane for the overworked porter.
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TODO_00<tab>雇われの荷運び人を探して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TODO_01<tab>Deliver Cid's parcel to Tataru.
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TODO_01<tab>ウルダハ商館のタタルに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CFE01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the magitek field generator manual to Alphinaud in Yanxia.
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TODO_02<tab>烈士庵のアルフィノに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C (()) /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TODO_03<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>I suppose I ought to go and take stock of our supplies. We'll be needing a lot of weapons...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALISAIE_000_000さて、私はひとまず、
途中になってた軍備の確認をすませようかしらね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_010<tab>You're here for the parcel Cid sent, right? Wait a moment, and it will be right out!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、
魔導装置に関する書簡を取りにいらしたんでっすね。
でしたら、ちょうどよかったでっす！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_011<tab>It arrived not long ago. A porter delivered it to our offices, along with various other knickknacks from Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_011さきほど、ちょうど西からの船が到着して、
雇われの荷運び人さんが、荷物や封書を届けてくれたのでっす。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_012<tab>Cid regrets that he couldn't come here in person. Apparently his hunt for the dragon and Omega demands his full attention, you see...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_012シドさんは、この件を依頼したとき、
時間が足りずに直接来られないことを、
すごく残念がっていらっしゃいまっした……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_013<tab>Still, he was reasonably confident that the documents he provided would be enough for Alphinaud to do the work himself. So as soon as that parcel gets here, we can open it up and see what's inside!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_013代わりに、気合をいれて説明を書くとおっしゃっていたので、
きっと、すごーい内容になってまっすよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_014<tab>Pardon my interruption, but the parcel in question─was it the one you placed on the shelf in the back for safekeeping?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_014……タタルさん、さきほど受け取った封書は、
そこの棚の上に置きましたよネ？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_015<tab>I believe so, yes. Why do you ask?
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_015<tab>はい、そのはずでっすが……？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_016<tab>Well, you see, on closer inspection, said parcel appears to have been addressed to the Sekiseigumi Barracks.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_016フゥ～ム……。
これは確かに気合の入っていそうな分厚い封書デスが、
よく見ると、あて先が赤誠組屯所になっていマス。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_017<tab>Though it does indeed bulge with a quantity of paper reminiscent of a rather large instruction manual, the lingering scent of lilac leads me to conclude it is in fact a sizable collection of love letters...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_017この丁寧な筆跡、そしてうっすら漂ういい香り……
間違いありません、これは隊士宛ての恋文デ～ス！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_018<tab>What!? Impossible! That porter was carrying a parcel addressed to us! I saw the writing with my own eyes!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_018えええぇぇぇぇ！？！？
そんなぁ、荷運び人さんは、
確かに私たち宛ての封書を持ってまっしたよ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_019<tab>Oh, I do not doubt that in the least. However, as he was tasked with a number of deliveries, I can only presume that he handed you another parcel by mistake.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_019アッハッハ。
ほかの商材と一緒に受け取りましたから、
最後に取り違えてしまったのデスネ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_020<tab>This is a disaster! We have to find that porter right this instant!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_020たたた、大変でっす！
急いで、さっきの荷運び人さんを探してきまっす！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_021<tab>My, she can move quickly when she has a mind to do so. So quickly she neglected to take these love letters with her. They too must be redirected to their rightful recipient.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_021おやまあ……。
返却する恋文も持たずに、飛び出していってしまいましたネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_022<tab>They should also aid you in tracking down the right porter. They keep records of their deliveries and so forth, after all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_022)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、お手数デスが、
この恋文を持って、「雇われの荷運び人」の捜索を、
手伝ってきてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_023<tab>The man in question was of middling height and build. Not unlike myself. Black hair, short─terribly helpful in Kugane, I know. A cheery sort. Wearing bright colors, as I recall?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_023荷運び人は、私と同じくらいの体格の青年デス。
黒の短髪で、動きやすそうな格好をしていたと思いマス。
布地は……明るい色でしたネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_024<tab>I will send a few of my men out to search, but in the meantime, why don't you take the parcel and see if you can't track him down yourself? I will wait here, on the off chance he realizes his mistake and returns.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_024私は入れ違いにならないよう、ここでタタルさんを待ちつつ、
うちの者を使って、荷運び人を探してみマ～ス。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_030<tab>Short, black hair, light-colored garments. In all other respects, not unlike myself. But then, I am so terribly unremarkable, am I not?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_030荷運び人は、私と同じくらいの体格の青年デス。
黒の短髪で、動きやすそうな格好をしていたと思いマス。
布地は……明るい色でしたネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_035<tab>Hey, you! Yeah, you! You came by the Ruby Bazaar earlier, right? Where's my parcel!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_035あれ？　あれ？
さっきの荷運び人さんじゃないでっす！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MAND02946_000_040<tab>Why are you yelling at me!? Who are you!?
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MAND02946_000_040<tab>いや、だから違うって……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANA02946_000_050<tab>Hm? Who are you? You seek company? For an hour or an evening?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANA02946_000_050んん……？
なんだい、今は休憩中なんだが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANA02946_000_051<tab>Ugh, how it reeks of perfume and desperation. I know naught of it, nor do I wish to know.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANA02946_000_051うわ、いろんな意味で重そうだ。
俺はただの客引き、そんな品とは無縁の男さ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANB02946_000_060<tab>Oh dear, oh dear... I misplaced some most important documents, and if I do not find them quickly, there will be dire repercussions...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANB02946_000_060ちょっとあんた、ここらで紙の束をみかけなかったかい？
大事なことが書いてあるんだけどさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANB02946_000_061<tab>No, no, it is nothing so scandalous and base! <sigh> My lord is a man with singular dietary restrictions, which I have detailed in my notebook. I cannot purchase produce without it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANB02946_000_061違う違う、それじゃないよ。
まいったなぁ……ご主人から買い物を言いつけられたのに、
品目を書いた帳面を落としちまうなんて！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_070<tab>A good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but I have no time to chat! I have to head to the Bokairo! ...Or was it the Hostelry? Bah, no time, no time!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_070あー、忙しい、忙しい！
次は望海楼か……いや、潮風亭を先にするか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_071<tab>Hm? Aye, I recognize that parcel. I delivered it to the Ruby Bazaar not long ago. What of it?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_071おお、どした！
そいつはさっき、ウルダハ商館に届けた封書じゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_072<tab>Eh? A mistake? For the Sekiseigumi, you say?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_072……え？　取り違えた？
赤誠組屯所宛ての封書だったって？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_073<tab>Bah, you're right! How stupid of me. Fortunately, I have yet to visit the barracks. This is for you, yes? I will take the other in exchange.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_073すまねぇ、手間かけちまったなぁ！
幸い、屯所にはまだ行けてねぇんだ。
そいつと「」を交換するよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANA02946_000_052<tab>Oh, if only I could relax like this every day...
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANA02946_000_052<tab>はー……いつまでもこうして休んでたいねぇ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANB02946_000_062<tab>I suppose I could try to buy produce without it. What is the worst that could happen? He could...get very sick, or perhaps die...and the Sekiseigumi could judge me a murderer and execute me... Oh dear...
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANB02946_000_062<tab>覚えている範囲で、買っていくか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_074<tab>I must remember to be more careful! The last thing I need is to be cursed by my customers...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_MANC02946_000_074危うく、文の送り主から祟られるところだったぜ。
くわばらくわばら……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_080<tab>Back already? Tataru is as well. She couldn't find the porter, in case you're wondering.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_080おかえりなさい！
タタルさんも、ほら、このとおりデスヨ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_090<tab>I'm sorry, I couldn't find him. I guess we just have to hope he realizes his mistake and returns soon...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_090うう、申し訳ないでっす。
恋文を忘れたと気付いて戻ったら、
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが行ってくださったと聞いて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_091<tab>That's it! That's the parcel! You found him!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_091こ、これは……！
今度こそ、私たち宛の封書でっすね！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_092<tab>Though, knowing our luck, Cid put the wrong papers in here...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_092念のため、中身も正しいか見ておくでっす。
ふむふむ……ふんふん……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_093<tab>Nope, this is it! These are the documents detailing the operation of the magitek field generators Alphinaud requested!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_093正真正銘、シドさんからの書簡でっす！
魔導装置の操作について、何やらたくさん書いてありまっす！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_094<tab>I can only imagine what would have happened had we sent <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> back to Doma with a parcel full of love letters. The look on Alphinaud's face when he reads the first page... On second thought, I'm a little disappointed we didn't.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_094よかったよかった。
そんなものが赤誠組のところに届いてしまったら、
いろいろと大問題になりかねませんからネ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_095<tab>Everyone's working so hard to fight for Doma's freedom, and here I am, making the same silly mistakes...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_095本当でっす……。
大切な戦いなんでっすから、私ももっとしっかりしないと。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_096<tab>It won't happen again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! And I'll keep working hard to bring you and the others useful information!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_096)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、私は引き続き、
ここで帝国の動きを探りまっす。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_097<tab>If we hear anything new, we'll contact you straightaway!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_097何かあったら、すぐご連絡いたしまっすが、
くれぐれも気をつけてと、みなさんに伝えてほしいでっす！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_098<tab>Oh, and you may be pleased to hear that we have brokered an arrangement between the company and the Confederacy. They require armaments, we provide. Discreetly, and at a reasonable price.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_098東アルデナード商会としても、
海賊衆のみなさんと、こっそり武具を取引する形で、
決戦に協力したいと思っていマ～ス。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_099<tab>I'm sure Lord Lolorito was pleased to hear it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_099それは、ドマのためでっす？
それとも利益をあげるためでっす……？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_100<tab>Ahaha! Indeed he was, indeed he was.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_100アッハッハ～！
もちろん、どっちもデ～ス！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_101<tab>Well, it seems our time together is at an end! Give Alphinaud and Alisaie my regards, will you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_101それでは、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
その書簡を「アルフィノ」さんのところへ……
よろしくお願いしまっす！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_110<tab>We've got eyes on the Garlean embassy, just so you know. If we notice anything suspicious, you'll be the first to hear about it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_TATARU_000_110くれぐれもお気をつけて！
ガレマール帝国大使館に動きがあったら、お伝えしまっす！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_115<tab>I can see it now. Confederate ships sailing up the One River, equipped with the finest Lominsan-made cannons, provided by the East Aldenard Trading Company. The world is not as big as it once was, my friend.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_115海賊衆も、最近まで腐ってましたからネ。
新しい武具のひとつも、必要でしょう？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALISAIE_000_120<tab>So much to do, and so little time to do it...
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALISAIE_000_120<tab>そろそろ、次の仕事にうつりたいところだけど……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_YUGIRI_000_125<tab>You are returned from Kugane? How fares Tataru?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_YUGIRI_000_125貴殿も戻ったか。
……タタル殿はお元気だったか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALPHINAUD_000_130<tab>Oh! It seems like just yesterday you were here. Our plans proceed apace. Do you have the documents?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALPHINAUD_000_130いいところに戻ってくれた。
こちらはちょうど、侵入経路の確認をおえたよ。
君の方は……？

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALPHINAUD_000_131<tab>Excellent! This looks to be exactly what we need.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALPHINAUD_000_131おお、これがシドからの……！
ありがとう、さっそく目を通して、
魔導装置の操作に不安がないようにしておこう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALPHINAUD_000_132<tab>Assuming our shinobi escort can see us safely inside the Moon Gates, I should have no trouble deactivating the barrier. Good, good─that is one less thing to worry about...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_ALPHINAUD_000_132これで、大龍月亮門の障壁はどうにかなるはずだ。
とある優秀な上忍も、作戦に加わってくれるそうでね。
……必ずや、役割をまっとうしてみせよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_005<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA509_02946_HANCOCK_000_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
